articles.title: USS aircraft carrier hit by major coronavirus outbreak to return to sea this week
articles.description: The USS Theodore Roosevelt is expected to return to sea this week after spending weeks in port in Guam following a major coronavirus outbreak on board in March, a US Navy official tells CNN.
